stop.message: Welcome to Phoenicia!
Use the Letter images at the bottom of your screen to start planting with the letter 'A'
Tap a letter to start planting it
Tap a location on the map to plant your new letter
When your letter if fully grown, tap it again to collect it
Your letters will start growing again for you to collect later
This is your storage building. Any words or letters you collect will be kept here for you to use.
You can also sell an item you have at any time, just by tapping on it.
Use the Word images to build a 'pan' factory
Tap a a word image to create a building for it
Tap a location on the map to place your building
Once your building is ready, you can use it to start making words
You create a word by spelling it, use the letters P A N to spell pan
It will take time for your word to finish, once it's ready you can collect it
Tap the finished word at the top to add it to your inventory
Now that you have some words, you can start selling them at the market.
Here you will find friends who would like to buy the letters and words you've gathered
Once you have everything they need, you can sell them to earn the coins you need to keep building your town
If you want to make a word that you don't have a building for yet, you can make it in your workshop
Here you can make any word in the game, all you need are the letters and knowing how to spell it
Try making the word map with the letters M A P
Great! But remember, you can only make one word at a time in the workshop, so keep making word buildings!

intro.page: Use the Letter images at the bottom of your screen to start planting with the letter 'A'
Great job! Now that you've grown some 'A's, lets try planting some 'T's
Now you're getting it! Lets grow some 'C's and you'll have enough letters to start building something
